item.title: Building a Desktop UI in Go
item.description: I started my career as a Software Developer building iOS apps. I had a passion for crafting user interfaces that had been realized in college when I leaned heavily towards the menu building portion of a 2D game I was writing at the time. As time moved on I found myself doing more and more web UIâ€™s , which makes sense, that is the way things are heading, especially in the enterprise.
